content: this text is about a legal case in the supreme court of croatia the case has been ongoing for 6 years and 1 month it involves a property owned by the city and the court initially decided to terminate the coownership and ordered the city to pay compensation to the applicant however the appellate court accepted the appeal and overturned the decision dismissing the request to terminate the coownership the decision was based on article 51 paragraph 1 of the property act
